#include<bits/stdc++.h>
using namespace std;
//for cin with white space cin.getline(var,sizeof(var)); with  char var[100];
#define lli long long int
#define pb push_back
#define mp make_pair
#define sd(a) scanf("%lld",&a)
#define pd(a) printf("%lld\n",a)
#define F first
#define S second
//***dont forget to clear the vector using v.clear();***


int main()
{
	lli t,x,y,n,m;
	sd(t);
	while(t--)
	{
	    lli a[1005],b[1002];
	    sd(n);
	    for(x=0;x<n;x++)
	    sd(a[x]);
	    sd(m);
	    for(x=0;x<m;x++)
	    sd(b[x]);
	    int dp[1002][1002];
	    for(x=0;x<=n;x++)
	    dp[0][x]=x;
	    for(x=0;x<=m;x++)
	    dp[x][0]=x;
	    for(x=1;x<101;x++)
	        for(y=1;y<101;y++)
	        dp[x][y]=0;
	    for(x=1;x<=m;x++)
	    {
	        for(y=1;y<=n;y++)
	        {
	            if(b[x-1]==a[y-1])
	                dp[x][y]=dp[x-1][y-1];
	        else
	        {
	            dp[x][y]=min(dp[x-1][y],min(dp[x-1][y-1],dp[x][y-1]))+1;
	        }
	        }
	    }
	    pd(dp[x-1][y-1]);
	}
    return 0;

}
